page.title: 12 School Life In Our Region
page.content: Our school was opened in 1978 and is semi-open planned. It is split into two halves, each half having a wet area surrounded by 4 classrooms. We have a hall, T.V. room, library and field. The school day starts at 9.00 a.m. with a break of 15mins at 10.30. Lunch is between 12.00 & 1.20 p.m. and in the afternoon we have another 15min break, school closing at 3.50 p.m. For lessons we have S.M.P. Maths from work cards, Language work - stories etc., and topic which everyone likes. Children travelling to school from Avenue Rd, Newton Bromswold and Newton Rd need to catch a coach at 8.00 a.m. This arrives at school at 8.30. They could walk but it is a long way. The children don't have an afternoon play so leave at 3.30 p.m. arriving home at 3.45. The coach buses infant, junior and senior children to various schools.
